verbose_text: Independent validation was obtained with small interfering RNA (siRNA) against caspase-4, which showed it was required for pyroptosis and IL-1beta release as measured by ELISA from EPEC infected macrophages (XREF_FIG A); as expected, caspase-4 was required for pyroptosis induced by cytosolic LPS, but not during treatment with LPS plus nigericin (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY F and S2G).
evidence: induced by cytosolic LPS, but not during treatment with LPS plus nigericin
